descriptions: ["DescriptionBetter Homes is proud to offer you this Exclusive property, in Al Wasl One. Its set on a 15,000 sqft plot with 13,000 sq ft built up area, It's a ground floor plus one. One of the best locations, just behind Box Park and five mins walk to City Walk. Downstairs of the villa has three majlis, dining room, elevator, 1 guest bedroom, maid's and laundry room with plenty of storage. Outside it has a large garden with barbecue area, driver's room, second kitchen, storage and parking for 6 cars. Upstairs has 6 en-suite bedrooms, large landing area which is used as a family room and small kitchenette. There is also a Burj Khalifa view from the 3 bedrooms. The location of the villa its an amazing one, only 5 minutes to Sheikh Zayed Road, 2 mIns walk to Box Park, the villa has a back entrance and private parking to the front .Box Park\xa0 offers trendy boutiques, concept dining and lively places. This hip hub brings a unique vibe to the shopping scene in Dubai with shops and cafes. Do not hesitate to call for booking a viewing with this beautiful villa."]

['DescriptionParkway Vistas Villas by Emaar Properties
Parkway Vistas by Emaar Properties is a luxurious residential project situated in the prime location of Dubai Hills Estate. The extravagant villas of Parkway Vistas face part of the 18-hole golf course, and offer the perfect surroundings for family life with a network of green corridors connecting the districts and providing shaded pathways, cycling and jogging tracks. The residences are available in 6 and 7-bedroom luxury villas.
The Parkway Vistas project provides the opportunity to pay the property with 2 YEARS POST HANDOVER PAYMENT PLAN. With this exclusive payment scheme offer, anyone can now easily purchase the property within a flexible schedule with easy installments.
Parkway Vistas Villas feature cutting-edge architecture and modern design combined with the residences’ expansive indoor and outdoor living spaces, make the home a haven to relax and with large balconies overlooking private gardens and pools. Natural sunlight floods through floor-to-ceiling windows into its rooms that feature every modern convenience and amenities. Superior materials and finishes have been used to ensure lasting quality throughout the expansive villas.']

descriptions:
['DescriptionJumeirah Islands is among Dubai’s hidden gems, that sits only a short drive away from the bustling Marina district and the vibrant Dubai coastline.
• Waterfront Community
• Upgraded
• Double-height Foyer 
• Modified Layout
• Huge Extended Pool
Several facets of the interiors have been modified by the current owners, including the layout and certain key features such as upgrades to the electrical features, finishes and more. Walking through the villa really gives you a sense of how much work has gone into making it look as beautiful as possible. In the modified layout, you have a spacious living and dining room flanked by a kitchen that can be open or closed courtesy of a sliding partition. The gorgeous designer kitchen incorporates smart wood cabinetry, including a cleverly concealed fridge/freezer. An L-shaped island separates the kitchen from the adjoining breakfast area. One side of the island contains a cooktop and offers a work surface, while the other side is an informal dining counter.
A beautiful marble staircase with a glass rail leads you upstairs, where you will find very comfortably appointed and generously sized bedrooms, along with a cosy family lounge. The upgraded bathrooms are spectacular and are certainly among the finest you will find in any home.
Large windows are fitted into all of the principal rooms, as well as inlay glass doors on the ground floor to create a smooth connection to the backyard. A maid’s room is part of the layout as well, featuring its own en-suite facilities.
Please get in touch to view this spectacular home and to learn about this amazing community.']
